verses.verse: I was glad <WH8055> when they said <WH559> unto me <WH3212>, Let us go into the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>.
Our feet <WH7272> shall stand <WH5975> inside your gates <WH8179>, O Jerusalem <WH3389>.
Jerusalem <WH3389> is built <WH1129> as a city <WH5892> that is compact <WH2266> together <WH3162>:

Where <WH8033> the tribes <WH7626> go up <WH5927>, the tribes <WH7626> of the Lord <WH3050>, unto the testimony <WH5715> of Israel <WH3478>, to give thanks <WH3034> unto the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068>.
For there are set <WH3427> thrones <WH3678> of judgment <WH4941>, the thrones <WH3678> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>.
Pray <WH7592> for the peace <WH7965> of Jerusalem <WH3389>: they shall prosper <WH7951> that love you <WH157>.
Peace <WH7965> be inside your walls <WH2426>, and prosperity <WH7962> inside your palaces <WH759>.
For my brothers <WH251> and companions <WH7453>' sakes <WH1696>, I will now say, Peace be inside you <WH7965>.
Because of the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430> I will seek <WH1245> your good <WH2896>.
